features.name: Public Storefront
features.description: Public-facing e-commerce storefront with product browsing, categories, campaigns, cart, and checkout

features.name: Admin Panel
features.description: Complete admin panel for managing products, categories, campaigns, banners, orders, users, and site settings

features.name: Authentication
features.description: User authentication system with NextAuth.js supporting email/password login and registration

features.name: Product Management
features.description: Complete product management system with images, videos, custom options, campaigns, and inventory

features.name: Campaign System
features.description: Advanced campaign management with percentage discounts, fixed amounts, category-specific, product-specific, and package deals

features.name: Shopping Cart
features.description: Shopping cart functionality with add, remove, update quantity, and campaign discount calculations

features.name: Payment Integration
features.description: PayTR payment gateway integration with test mode support for secure payment processing

features.name: Order Management
features.description: Order tracking, status updates, and order history for both customers and admins

features.name: Banner Management
features.description: Banner slider system with image management, positioning, and responsive display

features.name: Site Settings
features.description: Dynamic site settings including colors, logos, WhatsApp number, header marquee text, and footer links

features.name: Static Pages
features.description: Dynamic static page management system with content editor and automatic footer integration

features.name: Media Library
features.description: Centralized media library for managing reusable images and videos across the platform

features.name: Custom Sticker Options
features.description: Personalization feature for custom stickers with font selection, text input, and live preview

features.name: SEO Optimization
features.description: SEO features including meta tags, JSON-LD schema, sitemap, and robots.txt

features.name: Database Schema
features.description: Prisma schema defining all data models including User, Product, Category, Order, Campaign, Banner, and SiteSettings
